name: Antitoxin Touch
components: V, S, M (a small drop of antitoxin)
text: The target’s skin secretes a small amount of venom-resistant oils for the spell’s duration. The target cannot accidentally poison itself while applying poison. Additionally, the target does not risk exposure to a creature’s poison when attempting to milk venom (Ultimate Wilderness 142).
components_zh: 语言，姿势,材料（一小滴抗毒剂）
savingThrow_zh: 强韧, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 该目标的皮肤在法术生效期间会分泌少量抗毒的油脂。该目标不会在涂毒时意外中毒。此外，目标在尝试挤榨毒素（极限荒野（Ultimate Wilderness）142页）是不会有暴露于生物毒素下的风险。
